creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
description: decorated with moulding and feather edging; tureen finial and twisted handles have been applied by hand; finials on the serving pieces are in the shape of a bud; some pieces are potted thicker than others
object_name: Sauce Tureen and Stand, from a Child's Dinner Service
title: Sauce Tureen and Stand, from a Child's Dinner Service
